> <OLD>
>
> Tucson turns on Leo and stomps a powerful foot down on the ground.
> Something had just snapped inside his directory yet he still keeps his
> composure.
>
> " It isn't a matter of what the Predacon has told me, it was a matter of how
> composed they remained while helping us.  Oh yes I kept that in the back of
> my mind Leo Prime, I kept that in the back of my mind. "
>
> He narrows his eyes with a wise expression.
>
> " I wondered why the alliance went as well as it did.  I was sure to get a
> refusal but I didn't, and at first I thought nothing of it but then I
> started thinking.  How could this be?  Oh yes for a grave price you get
> cooperation from a Predacon.  Now you tell me Leo, I'm listening, how is it
> that this alliance happened so easily?  I will take back what I said and
> things will be as they stand, with you in command of course.  The truth Leo,
> all I want   IS THE TRUTH.  You can tell me that can you?"
>
> He stands firm with a thrash of his tail.

LEO PRIME stood there grinding his teeth, well he would if he had any
in robot mode. He glared at TUSCON. "Haven't you noticed that Hydras
isn't here, or Cyclonus or Scourge or any of the sweeps?" LEO said,
his voice calm but seething with his own anger. "The Predacons come
for the same reason as we, to locate their missing comrades and to
find out what is at the bottom of this jungle. The same reasons that
they were ready to do so before."

LEO paused for emphasis, "There is no offer of any life for a life for
this mission, and if you claim to know what it is to be a Prime then
you would know that I would never sell someone's life for this."

Even as he spoke LEO kept silent on the matters closest to him, like
the suspicion that the PREDACONS did have some other agenda, some
other reason for being here. But it was not something he was willing
to give voice to so close to finding out what was going on.

> <OLD>
>
> For the moment, witnessing the seeming altercation of aggression circuits
> between LEO PRIME and TUSCON PRIME as DINOBOT went out of the tunnel,
> flanking over towards SKY SHADOW with a look of..  AMUSEMENT upon his
> faceplate, but remaining in silence.
>
> Staying on inter-Predacon radio, which hopefully at close range would work
> then, and not be audible to the MAXIMALS, and sending a signal to CRYOTEK.
> <We seem to be restrained down here for now.  What are your orders then?
> Press on or attempt to instigate altercations within the MAXIMALS?>

<NEW>

Actually inside the caves radios were completely out. However CRYOTEK
had made his way back to stand with DINOBOT and SKYSHADOW. "We may
need them before we get to the end of this." CRYOTEK said
thoughtfully. "This is obviously a trap of some sort and unfortunately
we seem to be caught within it as much as the Maximals are." he said
in a low voice.

SKYSHADOW nodded, "Unfortunately I have to agree."

CRYOTEK glanced at DINOBOT, "But go ahead and do what you can to keep
them off balance. We can't have them ready to turn against us too
soon." He grunted, "Hydras has been taken from us, that seriously
changes the balance of power here."

> <OLD>
>
> The aerial Predacons up aboveground seemed to be cut off from them for now,
> who had not followed them underground (such as WASPINATOAR and
> BLACKARACHNIA).
>
> DRILL BIT had dug back underground once his bait had been laid, digging
> underneath.  VICE GRIP remained at hte rear of the tunnel, still cloaked,
> and attempting to (and most likely failing) to scan whatever had seemingly
> cut off the tunnel back to the surface.

<NEW>

Active sensors are down here inside the cave, however vibrations can
be sensed by DRILLBIT, vibrations that center roughly about in the
entrance chamber where they first entered into the caves. Vibrations
were very familiar to DRILL BIT and but centered on that entrance way
but spreading out to affect even the tunnels he was digging. . .

Even above the rest of the MAXIMALS and PREDACONS began to feel a
rumble and then a shaking, the rumbling quickly being felt down the
paths to where the rest of the MAXIMALS and the PREDACONS stood.
Anyone who had ever had any experience inside of caves or in
underground setting knew what they were feeling.

The opening tremors for a CAVE IN!!!!!

The walls began to shake as stone and rocks began to fall. The
apparent only way to safety lay in further into the caves themselves,
since, strangely enough, it was the cave through which most of the
MAXIMALS and PREDACON had entered this place was from where it seemed
to be extending from.

It was like they were being pushed or herded forward!

(TAG)

- Preston
